get_gpsl.descp: get the PSL file of genes based on GTF file
get_gpsl._comments: get the PSL file of genes based on GTF file

get_tpsl.descp: get the PSL file of transcripts based on GTF file
get_tpsl._comments: get the PSL file of transcripts based on GTF file

psl_seq.descp: get the FASTA file of transcripts (tpsl) or genes (gpsl)
psl_seq._comments: get the FASTA file of transcripts (tpsl) or genes (gpsl)

get_nonN.descp: get non-N region from FASTA file
get_nonN._comments: get non-N region from FASTA file, e.g., human genome

pslToBed.descp: get BED of genetic regions from PSL annotation
pslToBed._comments: get BED of genetic regions from PSL annotation, such CDS, UTR
